faq.question: How does it work?
faq.answer: Get a ride with others to save money and reduce your carbon footprint!

faq.question: Is it safe with strangers?
faq.answer: We make sure everyone's okay, so you can feel secure traveling with new folks.

faq.question: What benefits do I get?
faq.answer: Save money and earn good karma points by sharing rides.

faq.question: User ratings?
faq.answer: Give high-fives or thumbs down – let the stars speak for themselves.

faq.question: Customer support?
faq.answer: Call us or send a message – we're here to help however you like!
